originalText.text: We were offered a 3K spot at All My Children. I immediately submitted the required paperwork and then heard nothing. Despite repeated calls and emails to the contact person, I cannot reach her.  When I called the local office, they said the spots were subsequently filled by other candidates. Very shifty and unprofessional. My suspicion is they subsequently offered the spots to candidates who needed longer after-care hours (i.e, more money for them).  We will be filing a complaint with the DOE.

text.text: We were offered a 3K spot at All My Children. I immediately submitted the required paperwork and then heard nothing. Despite repeated calls and emails to the contact person, I cannot reach her.  When I called the local office, they said the spots were subsequently filled by other candidates. Very shifty and unprofessional. My suspicion is they subsequently offered the spots to candidates who needed longer after-care hours (i.e, more money for them).  We will be filing a complaint with the DOE.

originalText.text: I was contacted by All My Childrens enrollment department by email explaining they had my son on their 3K waitlist and that they had a spot for him in their universal 3K program. I called back to accept the spot and in the middle of setting up a tour they got off the phone to tend to something. They never called me back. Next day, after multiple calls to the office, I found out they gave my spot away to parents who put a deposit down for the DOE funded free program. Horrible.

text.text: I was contacted by All My Childrens enrollment department by email explaining they had my son on their 3K waitlist and that they had a spot for him in their universal 3K program. I called back to accept the spot and in the middle of setting up a tour they got off the phone to tend to something. They never called me back. Next day, after multiple calls to the office, I found out they gave my spot away to parents who put a deposit down for the DOE funded free program. Horrible.

originalText.text: The staff is very friendly,  especially the director Elisa. My kid is happy to go there every morning and loves his teacher. Being a brand new daycare , it took them a while to get things going, but things are on track now. We are coming back for prek next year.

text.text: The staff is very friendly,  especially the director Elisa. My kid is happy to go there every morning and loves his teacher. Being a brand new daycare , it took them a while to get things going, but things are on track now. We are coming back for prek next year.

originalText.text:
Spare yourself the stress of dealing with incompetence and concern for whether your children are adequately cared for.

This center doesn't know how often to change diapers, how to manage and maintain formula/breast milk, how to process billing or receive payments beyond paper checks or make adequate notice for times off, and has gone off the rails since the initial establishing Director left at the start of summer 2022. The list of 'can't dos' is longer than can do.

The program couldn't be more night and day. Every promise or reassurance made to us along the way in this relationship has been violated and we would never advise someone to put themselves or their children through dealing with this facility.
